name: GetOutboundTransfers
description:
Retrieve outbound transfers from a financial account.

This tool returns a list of outbound transfers sent from a specified financial account using Stripe's Treasury API.

parameters.name: financial_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the financial account to retrieve outbound transfers from.

value_schema.description: Returns objects associated with this FinancialAccount.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the previous page of the outbound transfers list using an object ID.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: List of fields in the response to be expanded. Provide field names as strings.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit_transfers
parameters.description: The number of outbound transfers to return. Valid range is 1 to 100, default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to fetch the next page of the list, using an object ID from a previous request.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

parameters.name: outbound_transfer_status_filter
parameters.description: Filter outbound transfers by status, such as 'processing', 'canceled', 'failed', 'posted', or 'returned'.

value_schema.description: Only return OutboundTransfers that have the given status: `processing`, `canceled`, `failed`, `posted`, or `returned`.
